# tf.contrib.metrics.confusion_matrix

Deprecated. Use tf.math.confusion_matrix instead.

``` python
tf.contrib.metrics.confusion_matrix(
    labels,
    predictions,
    num_classes=None,
    dtype=tf.dtypes.int32,
    name=None,
    weights=None
)
```



Defined in [`contrib/metrics/python/ops/confusion_matrix_ops.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.14/tensorflow/contrib/metrics/python/ops/confusion_matrix_ops.py).
